publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3651 Carolyn Leckie: Congratulations to Greenpeace at CBI Conference—That the Parliament congratulates Greenpeace on their direct action at the CBI conference; applauds its actions in exposing the hypocrisy of the UK Government’s stance on nuclear energy and in highlighting the pro-nuclear sympathies of the Government which fly in the face of the scientific facts regarding the dangers of nuclear waste, the lack of government investment in renewable energy and the lack of long-term investment in proper measures to tackle climate change, and condemns the actions of the Government which undemocratically ignores the wishes of the Scottish people regarding nuclear power.Supported by: Frances Curran*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-3651 Congratulations to Greenpeace at CBI Conference (lodged on 29 November 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-3651 Carolyn Leckie: Congratulations to Greenpeace at CBI Conference—That the Parliament congratulates Greenpeace on their direct action at the CBI conference; applauds its actions in exposing the hypocrisy of the UK Government’s stance on nuclear energy and in highlighting the pro-nuclear sympathies of the Government which fly in the face of the scientific facts regarding the dangers of nuclear waste, the lack of government investment in renewable energy and the lack of long-term investment in proper measures to tackle climate change, and condemns the actions of the Government which undemocratically ignores the wishes of the Scottish people regarding nuclear power. Supported by: Frances Curran, Campbell Martin, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
